name: Scalloped Potatoes
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: Cook potatoes, 1/2 c. water and salt for 5 minutes. Drain and pour into well oiled 1 1/2 quart baking dish. Heat milk, butter and cheese. Make a thin paste using the flour and 3 Tbsp. water. Add to milk mix- ture and bring to boil. Bake in 350Â° oven for 50 minutes.
